snippet: The wife of a British aid worker being held by Islamic State - the militant group targeted by U.S. and Gulf Arab air strikes in Syria - said on Tuesday she had received an audio message from her husband....

headline.print_headline: Briton Held by Islamic State Sends Audio Message to Family
headline.main: Briton Held by Islamic State Sends Audio Message to Family

lead_paragraph: The wife of a British aid worker being held by Islamic State - the militant group targeted by U.S. and Gulf Arab air strikes in Syria - said on Tuesday she had received an audio message from her husband.
